mainHero.title: AI-Powered
mainHero.subtitle: Compliance Automation
mainHero.description: Transform document risk identification and redaction from days to minutes. Zalos uses advanced AI to automatically detect sensitive data, mask compliance risks, and streamline your regulatory processes.

product.title: Complete Compliance Solution
product.subtitle: From Risk Detection to Audit Trail

items.title: Intelligent Risk Detection
items.description: AI algorithms automatically identify sensitive data, PII, and compliance risks across all document types with context-aware analysis that goes beyond simple keyword matching.

items.title: Automated Redaction Engine
items.description: Smart masking and anonymization across Microsoft formats with full audit trails. Redact, pseudonymize, or anonymize sensitive information while maintaining document integrity.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Review Risks at Speed and Scale
features.description: AI-driven risk identification, redaction and compliance - ready to scale with your needs

items.name: Set Rules
items.description: Configure PII, Company Sensitivities, or custom rules to match your legal framework.

items.name: Prioritize Files
items.description: Surface the most sensitive documents and pages for faster resolution.

items.name: Flag Risks
items.description: AI-driven detection of context-sensitive risks beyond simple keywords.

items.name: Manipulate Files
items.description: Redact, anonymize, or pseudonymize across Microsoft file formats.

items.name: Seamless Integrations
items.description: Works natively with SharePoint, secure file transfer, or other integration needs.

items.name: Ensure Auditability
items.description: Log changes, rationale for every redaction, and maintain a full audit trail.

useCases.title: Purpose-built for high security
useCases.subtitle: Protect sensitive data across regulated industries with advanced, compliant anonymization.

items.title: Data Subject Access Requests
items.description: Automate DSAR fulfilment by finding, extracting, and redacting relevant files while maintaining an audit trail.

items.title: Past Project File Anonymisation
items.description: Clean legacy archives for safe re-use in wider organizations or AI pipelines - without risking burying hidden risks.

items.title: Regulatory & Compliance Reviews
items.description: Meet internal and external compliance demands with consistent, repeatable anonymisation workflows.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your compliance needs

sections.name: Our Mission
sections.content: Zalos is on a mission to eliminate the hidden costs of manual compliance processes. We believe every organization deserves enterprise-grade compliance automation that's both powerful and accessible.

sections.name: The Problem
sections.content: Manual redaction increases risks, reduces efficiency, and is impossible to scale. Large document sets take days to process, human processes are prone to errors, and poor oversight makes audits a guessing game.

sections.name: Our Solution
sections.content: AI-driven risk identification, redaction, and compliance automation that scales with your needs. Set rules, prioritize files, flag risks, and manipulate documents while maintaining full auditability.

sections.name: Why Zalos
sections.content: Built by compliance experts and AI engineers, Zalos combines deep regulatory knowledge with cutting-edge technology to deliver solutions that actually work in real-world compliance scenarios.

callToActionSection.title: Ready to save time & improve compliance?
callToActionSection.subtitle: Request a call to discuss reducing risk, saving time, and automating smarter.
